EmailTemplate.description: Account Name Change Request Submission Email
EmailTemplate.name: Account Name Change Request Submission Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Account Request for Name Change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear DS Team,
You are requested to approve the request for Name Change {!Account_Requests__c.Client_Name__c}.
Please click on the following link to access the request on LinKreta {!Account_Requests__c.Link}
Note:- This is a system generated email. Please do not reply to this mail.
